survey_name: Electric Vehicle Charging Station Accessibility Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to gather feedback on the accessibility, usability, and satisfaction levels of public electric vehicle (EV) charging stations to improve infrastructure and user experience.

questions.question_text: How frequently do you use public electric vehicle charging stations?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice radio button for this question. Ensure mobile-friendly layout.

script.question_text: How frequently do you use public electric vehicle charging stations?

questions.question_text: What are your primary reasons for using public EV charging stations? (Select all that apply)
questions.routing_logic: Respondents who selected 'Daily', 'Weekly', 'Monthly', or 'Rarely' in Q1
questions.client_notes: Use a multi-choice checkbox format. Include an 'Other' option with an open-text field for additional input.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: MULTI_CHOICE (checkboxes) with an optional open-text field for 'Other'

script.question_text: What are your primary reasons for using public EV charging stations? (Select all that apply)
script.routing_logic: Respondents who selected 'Daily', 'Weekly', 'Monthly', or 'Rarely' in Q1

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the availability of EV charging stations in your area?
questions.routing_logic: Respondents who selected 'Daily', 'Weekly', 'Monthly', or 'Rarely' in Q1
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale with single-choice radio buttons.
